# update(with:)

**Instance Method**

Insert an integer into the `IndexSet`.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func update(with integer: IndexSet.Element) -> IndexSet.Element?
```

## Inserting Elements

- **insert(_:)**: Insert an integer into the `IndexSet`.
- **insert(integersIn:)**: Insert a range of integers into the `IndexSet`.

items.description: Insert a range of integers into the `IndexSet`.
